name: Crystal Onix

attacks.name: Deep Dive
attacks.effect: Put a card on the bottom of your deck. Draw a card.

attacks.name: Crystal Shatter
attacks.effect: You may generate an Ice Energy and shuffle it into your opponent's deck.

flavor: These Onix are known for living in a crystal cave in the Orange Islands. While the rest of the world considers them rare, it's all the islanders know.
